overclocks.name: Energy Rerouting
overclocks.description: A masterwork of engineering that improves charge speed and energy efficiency without affecting overall performance!

overclocks.name: Magnetic Cooling Unit
overclocks.description: A high-tech solution to cleanly improve the cooling rate. The result is an increased number of shots that can be fired before overheating, a faster recovery from an overheat, and an extended duration that a full charge can be maintained.

overclocks.name: Heat Pipe
overclocks.description: By channeling exhaust heat back into the charge chamber, a shot can be charged faster while using less energy. Unfortunately, this process generates a lot more heat.

overclocks.name: Heavy Hitter
overclocks.description: Some extensive tweaking to how the shots are prepared can increase the pure damage of the weapon, but at the cost of more heat per shot and a reduced battery size.

overclocks.name: Overcharger
overclocks.description: Pushing the EPC to the limit will give you a significant increase in charge shot damage and a boost in the size of the explosion, but at the cost of thermal efficiency and energy consumption.

overclocks.name: Persistent Plasma
overclocks.description: By changing how the plasma is layered within the charged projectile, a slow and persistent discharge can be achieved upon impact. However, this does reduce the instant damage done.
